name: yalla-growth-social-pipeline
description: Yalla London Growth & Social Pipeline: Weekly strategy → content creation → distribution → tracking → iteration. Covers social media marketing, brand growth, and community building across all sites.

data.prompt:
Weekly growth strategy review per site:
1. Review last week's performance (impressions, engagement, clicks, followers)
2. Identify top-performing content themes
3. Plan content calendar for the week (3-5 social posts per site)
4. Cross-promote between Zenitha network sites
5. Identify trending hashtags and topics in luxury travel space
6. GCC audience targeting: Arabic content timing (evening GST), Ramadan/Eid seasons
7. Platform strategy: Instagram (visuals), X/Twitter (tips), TikTok (short video)
Output: Weekly social content plan per site.

Repurpose published blog content into social media formats:
- Extract key quotes and tips from blog posts for Twitter/X threads
- Create Instagram carousel summaries (5-7 slides) from listicle articles
- Generate short-form video scripts from travel guides
- Create Pinterest pins from featured images + overlay text
- Bilingual versions: EN posts for global reach, AR posts for Gulf audience
- Include affiliate links where platform allows (Instagram bio, link stickers)
Tag with source article URL for attribution tracking.

Build and nurture community across platforms:
- Respond to comments and DMs (template responses for common questions)
- Engage with related travel content creators and influencers
- Share user-generated content (with permission)
- Create polls and questions to boost engagement
- Cross-site community: introduce Yalla London followers to Arabaldives, Yalla Riviera
- Track community growth metrics: followers, engagement rate, sentiment
- Identify potential brand ambassadors (frequent engagers with Gulf audience)

Distribute social content across platforms:
- Instagram: Visual posts, Stories, Reels
- Twitter/X: Threads, tips, link sharing
- TikTok: Short travel clips
- Pinterest: Destination pins, travel boards
- LinkedIn: Zenitha.Luxury brand updates
Platform-specific optimization:
- Optimal posting times per platform and audience (GCC evening = 4-8pm GST)
- Platform-native formatting (aspect ratios, caption lengths, hashtag counts)
- UTM parameters on all links for attribution tracking

Track social engagement metrics:
- Per-post: impressions, likes, comments, shares, saves, clicks
- Per-platform: follower growth, engagement rate, reach
- Per-site: which site content performs best on which platform
- Referral traffic: social → website visits → affiliate clicks
- Content type analysis: which formats drive most engagement
- Hashtag performance tracking
- Competitor benchmarking (luxury travel accounts)
Generate weekly social performance report for dashboard.

branches.label: Iterate
branches.condition: Underperforming content themes or declining engagement detected

data.prompt:
Adjust growth strategy based on performance data:
- Double down on high-performing content themes
- Retire underperforming content formats
- Adjust posting schedule based on engagement time analysis
- Reallocate effort between platforms (invest more in best-performing)
- Update hashtag strategy based on performance
- Test new content angles (behind-the-scenes, user stories, seasonal)
Feed adjustments back into next week's strategy cycle.
